nodes.bodyText: You'll need to add this experiment to the impacted tests since some tests expect an SDF.

I couldn't  find a way to pass experiments into ExpansionService: https://github.com/apache/beam/blob/master/sdks/java/expansion-service/src/main/java/org/apache/beam/sdk/expansion/service/ExpansionService.java#L384-L393 so I just leave the test to verity non-sdf read.
